module.caption: TC - Timer Counter
module.info: The Timer Counter includes three identical 16-bit Timer Counter channels. Each channel can be independently programmed to perform a wide range of functions including frequency measurement, event counting, interval measurement, pulse generation, delay timing and pulse width modulation.

module.caption: TC - Timer Counter
module.info: Driver for the TC (Timer Counter). The Timer Counter includes three identical 16-bit Timer Counter channels. Each channel can be independently programmed to perform a wide range of functions including frequency measurement, event counting, interval measurement, pulse generation, delay timing and pulse width modulation.
This application note describes how to use the ASF driver for interfacing to the Timer Counter on SAM4.
